articles.author: Tsotso Ablorh
articles.title: History of ADHD Research Reveals Our Flawed Thinking About Mental Disorders - Mad in America
articles.description: Stephan Schleim examines the history of ADHD to demonstrate the limits of our biological understanding of mental disorders.
articles.content: In a new article in Frontiers in Psychiatry, the theoretical psychologist Stephan Schleim shares his perspective on the ongoing search for the biological bases of mental health disorders. Using ADHD … [+7530 chars]
